column2: ENGLISH
Perform the mating ritual
It is mating season and you are in heat, as are other murlocs.
Has a murloc spouse, concubine that hasn't mated yet.
Not busy doing other things.
You haven't already fertilized eggs this year.
It is early in the year, and that means it's mating season. Nature itself urges you to procreate.
It's time!
You venture out to find a mate.
Not this year.
Your heat is at full swing now, and you can't hold yourself back forever.
Give in to the urges.
Resist the urges.
You've mated with your [From.GetHusbandWifeOpp], [From.GetFirstName].
It is breeding season and your [murloc_breed_one.GetHusbandWife], [murloc_breed_one.GetFirstName] approaches you. You both give in to your instincts.
You've mated with your concubine, [From.GetFirstName].
It is breeding season and your consort, [murloc_breed_one.GetFirstName] approaches you. You both give in to your instincts.
You've mated with your lover, [From.GetFirstName].
It is breeding season and your lover, [murloc_breed_one.GetFirstName] approaches you. You both give in to your instincts.
A most horrible thing has happened to you today: while searching for [From.GetFirstName] so you could breed, you find her mating with that dastardly [murloc_breed_one.GetFirstName]!
Expose them!
Let's just... forget this ever happened.
Your [From.GetHusbandWife] has caught you mating with [murloc_breed_one.GetFirstName]! Worse, [From.GetSheHe] has exposed you to everyone!
[FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s [From.GetHusbandWife] has caught you mating with [FromFrom.GetFirstName]! Worse, [From.GetSheHe] has exposed you to everyone!

Though it is mating season, you have no [Root.GetHusbandWifeOpp], no consorts and no lovers. Wandering through the grounds, you find [From.GetBestName], who is also alone. Together, you mate and a bond is forged.
Unfortunately, it seems none of the eggs you've lain during mating season have hatched.
Only one of the eggs you've lain during mating season has hatched.
Two of the eggs you've lain during mating season have hatched.
Three of the eggs you've lain during mating season have hatched!
Four of the eggs you've lain during mating season have hatched!
All five eggs you've lain during mating season have hatched!
Unfortunately, it seems none of the eggs you've lain during mating season have hatched.
Only one of the eggs you've lain during mating season has hatched.
Two of the eggs you've lain during mating season have hatched.
Three of the eggs you've lain during mating season have hatched!
Four of the eggs you've lain during mating season have hatched!
All five eggs you've lain during mating season have hatched!
Mating season has come and gone, and you've not participated in it. Other murlocs frown disapprovingly at you.
